is a small city in Serra da Estrela in

value: content=The uniqueness of the Serra da Estrela Higher Plateau and its geographical isolation gave rise to a diversity of flora and fauna species, whose value was acknowledged when the Council of Europe assigned it the title of Biogenetic Reservation.

content=A House built according to local traditions, using yellow granite. An attempt was made to maintain the “memory” of the house, harmonising ancient wisdom with the need to create a modern and comfortable atmosphere.

content=Offers lodgings all equipped with television, living area, dining area, kitchen, and a private toilet and bath. Some of its facilities and amenities are children play center, garden, parking, golf, trekking, and tennis.
